ygData.messageBody:
Shada, you forgot the spear as well (11 dam 25 delay).

Rokenn


>From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <garramone@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: "'eqbards@onelist.com'" <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Welp... it was me :)
>Date: Wed, 23 Feb 2000 11:04:12 -0500
>
>i have seen this said a few times now about the bard weapons in hate.
>correct me if i'm wrong, but i have all 3 weapons from there. 2 are off
>maestro and they are the same dmg/del (11/25) but 1 is blunt (evensong)and
>the other is slashing (six note blade), so yes they are virtually identical
>if you have both weapon skills maxed. but the third weapon is the martune
>rapier, 8/23 5str 4agi and comes off normal scorn banshees. just to clear
>up.
>
>Shada Powa, L50 Wood Elf Bard
>Tyria Sarkin, L41 High Elf Wizard
><Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server
>
>
> >
> > Instead we are stuck with three
> > identical non-procing weapons.
